context: HI! Can you reccomend any good comedies?

Of course! It IS a classic!

I haven't seen any of the sequels. Are they as good?
i will have to check it out!
If you want a movie that was released recently I would recommend you Game Night (2018) Game Night (2018) is really funny , I laughed a lot
Have not heard of that, but will take a look at it. I heard they put out a sequel to Super Troopers (2001) . Have you heard anything about it?
resp: I have never watched Super Troopers (2001) to be honest. Is it a good comefy?
